alphabetsoup.framework
Class SimulationWorld

java.lang.Object
  alphabetsoup.framework.SimulationWorld
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimulationWorldGraphExample, SimulationWorldGreedyTaskAllocation, SimulationWorldMarketTaskAllocation, SimulationWorldMarketTaskAllocation, SimulationWorldPrecomputed, SimulationWorldSimpleExample
public class SimulationWorld
extends java.lang.Object

SimulationWorld is the base class of the AlphabetSoup simulation itself. This class should be extended to load and initialize all of the entities within AlphabetSoup. SimulationWorld contains these entities and updates them all accordingly to advance the simulation forward in time.

Author:
Chris Hazard

Constructor Detail

SimulationWorld

public SimulationWorld(java.lang.String configuration_file_name)
Builds the base for the simulation. Loads in parameters from the specified configuration file. Instantiates some of the basic simulation structure.

Parameters:
configuration_file_name - path of the configuration file to load

initializeBucketContentsRandom

public void initializeBucketContentsRandom(float initial_inventory,
                                           int bundle_size)
populates buckets with completely random inventory

Parameters:
initial_inventory - fraction of total capacity that should be full in the range of [0,1]
bundle_size - size of a bundle of letters (all inventory will be grouped by bundle size)
